column1: #Text=Actor Sokka says : " Can I help you ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Actually , I think I can help you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Just hear me out .
#Text=Here 's something I think the real Sokka would say .
#Text=What does the cabbage merchant use to fix his cabbages ?
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " That 's actually pretty good !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Also , do n't be afraid to make up some phrases , especially before an attack .
#Text=" Actor Sokka says : " Who are you , anyway ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm just a guy who likes comedy .
